slide.title: PHP5 OO - Private

list.bullet: Can only be accessed/called from the same class
Force use of get()/set() functions to access properties

slide.example:
<?php
class Bedroom {
	private $action;

	function __construct() {
		$this->action = 'fun';
	}
}

$br = new Bedroom();
echo $br->action. "\n";
?>
Fatal error: Cannot access private property bedroom::$action in foo.php on line 12
